title: Narumi, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRQ; ULQ
description: two men carry a woman in a palanquin near center, preceded by two women in grey kimono; behind them is a figure riding a horse led by an attendant, followed by another with two large blue parcels balanced over PR shoulder; two shops displaying colorful fabrics line the L side of the road
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
